titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard mileage rates during 2001 for certain deductions for use of a passenger automobile to 50 cents per mile.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the standard mileage rates during 2001 for business use, charitable purpose, medical care, and moving expense deductions for use of a passenger automobile to fifty cents per mile.
